items.sentence: Tom told me that he often drinks root beer, but he\'d not only never drunk spruce beer, he\'d never even heard of it.
Tom always wanted to be a doctor, but his grades at school weren\'t quite good enough to get him into medical school.
My opponent loves to give grand sonorous speeches that ultimately say nothing. I prefer to get straight to the point.
When Tom told Mary to feel right at home, he was secretly hoping that she'd go and wash up the dishes in the kitchen.
I've heard that your child is more likely to die at a friend's house with a pool than at a friend's house with a gun.
